mapper.select: select A.boardPk, A.seq, A.title, A.hits, A.regDt , A.userPk, B.nm AS writerNm From t_board A inner join t_user B on A.userPk = B.userPk where A.category = #{category} and A.isDel = 0 order by boardPk DESC;
select A.boardPk, A.category, A.title, A.ctnt, A.hits, A.regDt , A.userPk, B.nm AS writerNm From t_board A inner join t_user B on A.userPk = B.userPk where A.boardPk = #{boardPk};

UPDATE t_board
hits = hits + 1
title = #{title},
ctnt = #{ctnt},
isDel = 1,
modDt = now()
WHERE boardPk = #{boardPk}
AND userPk = #{userPk}
